ygData.subject: Re: fear plane
ygData.msgSnippet: I went to the bank the other day, and I had purchased a large box to put a bunch of things in the box to store in the bank.  I had the 4 dwarven tongues and
ygData.messageBody:
I went to the bank the other day, and I had purchased a large box to
put a bunch of things in the box to store in the bank. I had the
4 dwarven tongues and Rondo's tongue (5 total) in the bank. So they
were all taking up 5 slots. So, I took them all out, put them in the
box, and then tried to put them back in the bank - no dice. They were
all NO DROP now.


>From: "Azor" <jmaynus@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>

>From: "Azor" <jmaynus@...>

>might

>another
>item a lore or a No Drop item, they keep up with the No Drops and we won't
>be able to drop, sell or trade anything.
>But anyways what lvl is the Plane of Fear?
>
>**************************
>Azor
>Lvl 18 Human Cleric of the Rathe
>**************************
